title: Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Fasting | Jimmy Moore on Health Theory
description: Jimmy Moore, bestselling author of Keto Clarity and host of the long-running Livin’ La Vida Low Carb Podcast, joins Tom in this week’s episode of Health Theory. Tom and Jimmy discuss all things keto, cholesterol, fasting, and how you can become an empowered and knowledgeable patient.   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by ButcherBox.
